title: Dink Fonts
content:
Hi,  
I was just wondering if anybody on the forum might know what happened to Dink fonts ? Are they still around ? Several google searches yielded no response. As I recall, Dink specialised in American vernacular font design, designs from the 50's, period pieces… I wanted to show their site to one of my students, but I seem quite unable to find any trace whatsoever.

Thanks in advance for any help…

best wishes,

pete
author: mr_cheese

comments.content: Do you mean Dinc!-type? Isn't that [Girlswhowearglasses](http://web.archive.org/web/20100717141118/http:/www.girlswhowearglasses.com/)?

Thanks so much Renko ! That's brilliant.  
It is indeed Girlswhowearglasses !!

merci !!

pete
You are welcome, pete. Glad to help.
